name: Clarion Call
source: Knights of the Inner Sea pg. 28
components: V, S, M (a piece of brass)
text: The subject of this spell gains two benefits. First, the affected creature gains the ability to create a sound like the blast of a mighty horn or trumpet simply by miming the action of sounding one. Second, the subject can speak in a booming voice that carries easily over great distances, lowering the DC of any check to hear what is said by –15. This spell is particularly prized by battlefield commanders and champions who wish to make themselves clearly heard or gain the attention of their allies or foes.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料 (一块黄铜)
savingThrow_zh: 强韧, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 此法术的受术者获得两项益处。首先，受术者获得一种能力，透过一个简单的模仿发声动作，能创造出一种类似震耳欲聋的号角或小号的声音。其次，受术者可以在洪亮的声音中说话，这些话可以很轻易的被带向远处，任何为了听到此话语的DC检定降低15。这法术特别受到那些想要让他们的盟友或敌人听得更清楚，或是集中注意力的战场指挥官或卫士。
